decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently assemble the Allosaurus Combo by using cards like Eldritch Evolution and Neoform to tutor for key combo pieces, such as Allosaurus Rider and Chancellor of the Tangle. The deck also includes various cards like Nourishing Shoal and Summoner's Pact to help facilitate the combo and ensure its success. By using a combination of creatures, spells, and mana acceleration, this deck aims to combo off and overwhelm the opponent in a short amount of time.

This Goblin aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a swarm of creatures, utilizing cards like Goblin Matron and Goblin Ringleader to fetch more Goblins and maintain card advantage. Grumgully, the Generous and other support cards like Munitions Expert and Murderous Redcap provide additional synergy and removal options. The deck also includes key cards like Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play and Cavern of Souls to ensure Goblins can't be countered. The strategy revolves around quickly building a powerful board presence and dealing damage efficiently.

This deck focuses on using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to control the game and outvalue the opponent. The deck includes a variety of versatile spells like Cryptic Command, Assassin's Trophy, and Drown in the Loch to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also utilizes cards like Snapcaster Mage and Into the Story to generate card advantage and maintain control over the game. Additionally, the deck includes lands like Mystic Sanctuary to recur powerful spells and grind out incremental advantages over time.

The main focus of this Modern Aggro Red Deck Wins archetype is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient creatures and burn spells. By playing low-cost creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear along with direct damage spells like Lava Spike and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently before the opponent can stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Eidolon of the Great Revel and Shard Volley adds additional pressure and reach to the deck, while cards such as Seal of Fire and Fiery Islet provide both removal and card advantage. The mana base is optimized for speed and consistency, with Sunbaked Canyon providing extra card draw.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly generate mana with various elves and utilize the combo potential of cards like Dwynen's Elite, Heritage Druid, and Elvish Archdruid to flood the board with creatures. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of elves and finish them off with Shaman of the Pack. Collected Company is used to dig for key combo pieces and Winding Way helps with card draw. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, allowing the deck to execute its combo strategy efficiently.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly mill the opponent's library using cards like Hedron Crab, Glimpse the Unthinkable, and Mesmeric Orb in order to win the game by forcing them to draw from an empty library. The deck also includes control elements like Fatal Push and Drown in the Loch to disrupt the opponent's strategy while protecting the combo pieces. The inclusion of Visions of Beyond allows for card draw once the opponent's library starts to dwindle. Overall, the deck aims to mill the opponent out as quickly and efficiently as possible while controlling the game state.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively burn through the opponent's life total using a combination of cheap, efficient burn spells and hasty creatures. By consistently casting spells and attacking with creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early in the game and close out the match before the opponent can stabilize. Cards like Light Up the Stage and Bedlam Reveler provide card advantage to help maintain the aggression. This deck prioritizes speed and constant pressure to overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of this Modern Aggro - Humans deck is to flood the battlefield with aggressive Human creatures that can quickly build up power and overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Champion of the Parish, Noble Hierarch, and Thalia's Lieutenant, this deck aims to put early pressure on the opponent and disrupt their game plan with cards like Meddling Mage and Reflector Mage. Aether Vial provides additional versatility and speed, while the mana base of Ancient Ziggurat, Cavern of Souls, and Horizon Canopy ensures consistent mana production for the aggressive strategy.

This deck aims to aggressively use the Death's Shadow mechanic to lower its life total and power up its creatures. By playing cards like Street Wraith and Mishra's Bauble to cycle through the deck and trigger abilities, the deck can quickly get Death's Shadow to a large power and toughness. In addition, it includes discard spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also utilizes cards like Tarmogoyf and Temur Battle Rage to further push for a quick victory.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly and efficiently deal 10 poison counters to the opponent through the use of infect creatures like Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf, while using pump spells like Scale Up and Might of Old Krosa to boost their power and toughness. The deck also includes protection spells like Vines of Vastwood and Spell Pierce to help ensure the infect creatures can get through. This fast-paced combo strategy aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to react.

This deck focuses on using artifacts and control elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan while generating value through Urza, Lord High Artificer and Emry, Lurker of the Loch. The deck aims to assemble the Thopter Sword combo for a win condition, while also utilizing Oko, Thief of Crowns for additional disruption and card advantage. It includes various artifact tutors and mana ramp to quickly find and play key pieces, along with sideboard options to adapt to different matchups. Overall, the deck aims to control the game and outvalue the opponent to secure a win.

This deck focuses on using creatures with abilities that generate value or combo well together, along with cards that tutor these creatures from the deck. It aims to assemble a winning board state by tutoring for the right creatures at the right time, while also disrupting opponents with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler. The deck's toolbox approach allows for versatility in different matchups, utilizing cards like Karn, the Great Creator to find answers or threats as needed. The combo potential with cards like Devoted Druid and Vizier of Remedies provides a powerful win condition.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly and efficiently deal lethal infect damage to the opponent with the creatures Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf, while also using pump spells like Groundswell, Might of Old Krosa, and Mutagenic Growth to increase their power and protect them with Blossoming Defense and Vines of Vastwood. The deck also includes support cards like Noble Hierarch and Spellskite to help enable the combo. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with infect damage before they can establish a defense.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's resources while deploying powerful threats quickly. By using cards like Leonin Arbiter and Ghost Quarter to disrupt your opponent's mana base, Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to increase the cost of their spells, and Chalice of the Void to lock them out of certain mana costs, you can control the game and protect your own game plan. Meanwhile, Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher provide powerful beatdown potential to close out the game quickly. This deck focuses on aggressive plays and efficient disruption to overwhelm opponents.

The deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creature threats like Emrakul and Griselbrand using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Through the Breach. Generator Servant and Simian Spirit Guide allow for fast mana acceleration to cheat out big creatures early. Ilharg, the Raze-Boar provides an additional way to put huge creatures into play while also providing a reusable threat. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Thoughtseize and Collective Brutality to help protect the combo. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Pentad Prism and Wishclaw Talisman help ramp and find combo pieces.

This deck focuses on using efficient spells and disruptive counterspells to control the board while deploying powerful threats like Young Pyromancer and Delver of Secrets to pressure the opponent. By combining aggressive creatures with versatile instants and sorceries, it aims to maintain a fast tempo and overwhelm the opponent before they can establish a strong defense. Mystic Sanctuary provides additional value by recurring important spells, while Brazen Borrower offers flexibility as both a disruptive creature and a removal spell. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around leveraging its spells and creatures to quickly close out games.
